attributes.action: spread the driver training of MOD vehicles, from Leconfield, around the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will relieve the daily congestion, of all roads in and around Kingston upon Hull and the East Riding of Yorkshire, by hundreds of lorries/trailers, frequently travelling around 100 yards behind each other and converging in Supermarket car parks.
